name: evqueue-frontend-react
description: evQueue scheduler frontend, fully written in react JS

scripts.pack:index: cat htdocs/index.html | sed -e '/DEV/,/END DEV/c\' | grep -v PROD | grep -v 'END PROD' >htdocs/index.prod.html
scripts.pack:extension:
zip evqueue-browser-plugin.zip manifest.json browser-plugin/* htdocs/index.prod.html htdocs/fonts/* htdocs/images/* htdocs/styles/dist/ui.css htdocs/styles/vendor/* htdocs/js/dist/evqueue.js htdocs/js/vendor/*/*; zip evqueue-browser-plugin-src.zip -r browser-plugin htdocs manifest.json package.json README.md && printf "@ htdocs/index.prod.html
@=htdocs/index.html
" | zipnote -w evqueue-browser-plugin.zip && printf "@ htdocs/index.prod.html
@=htdocs/index.html
" | zipnote -w evqueue-browser-plugin-src.zip
scripts.pack:dist:
ln -s htdocs evqueue && zip evqueue.zip evqueue/index.prod.html evqueue/fonts/* evqueue/images/* evqueue/styles/dist/ui.css evqueue/styles/vendor/* evqueue/js/dist/evqueue.js evqueue/js/vendor/*/* evqueue/conf/cluster.dist.json && printf "@ evqueue/index.prod.html
@=evqueue/index.html
" | zipnote -w evqueue.zip && printf "@ evqueue/conf/cluster.dist.json
@=evqueue/conf/cluster.json
" | zipnote -w evqueue.zip && rm evqueue
scripts.pack: rm evqueue evqueue.zip evqueue-browser-plugin.zip evqueue-browser-plugin-src.zip 2>/dev/null; npm run build && npm run pack:js && npm run pack:index && npm run pack:extension && npm run pack:dist && rm htdocs/index.prod.html

author: Thibault Kummer
